jobDescription: Baidu USA, located in Silicon Valley, is looking for world-class engineers to join its IDG team a.k.a Intelligent Driving Group. The IDG team is aiming to develop advanced autonomous driving technologies which will let us transform mobility and improve the lives of billions of people. We are looking for a Senior Hardware Engineer with the strong automotive background to build one of the most reliable and advanced autonomous driving systems in the world. He or she will be pushing the autonomous driving system from prototype towards volume production. Here is what you will do: Perform a full cycle of automotive PCBA product development (Specification, schematic, layout, BOM, manufacturing and lab bring up) Support DVT, EMI/EMC, Shock and Vibration and relevant validation process required by automotive industry Debug and failure analysis Evaluate performance, reliability and safety Cost analysis and optimization Here is what we’d like to see in you: Familiarity with microprocessor, memory, high-speed interface, digital circuit, analog circuit digital, FPGA logic and DC/DC power supply design Ability to travel as required Culture fit: Mission alignment: If you want to be part of Baidu IDG to accomplish our audacious mission, we will provide you with the best possible platform to do that. Self­-directed: We work best with people that are driven, motivated, and aspire to greatness. Are you the sort of person that, if you had time on your hands, will independently find interesting ways to push the envelope? Hungry to learn: We are eager to see you learn new skills and grow. But learning is hard work and this is something we hope you want to do. Team orientation: We work in small, fast­-moving teams. We don't believe in lone wolves. We watch out for each other and go after big goals together as a team.

AI Research Engineer Co-located in Silicon Valley, Seattle and Beijing, Baidu Research brings together top talents from around the world to focus on future-looking fundamental research in AI. IDL (Institute of Deep Learning) is committed to conduct fundamental research and practical applications on deep learning, computer vision, text-to-speech synthesis, simultaneous translation, language understanding, medical AI and bio-informatics, and innovative applications. We are looking for research engineers with strong passion in applying AI technology and make an impact on the real world. In our team, Research Engineers and Research Scientists work closely to solve challenging problems. Job Responsibilities: Be a highly technical coder. Design and develop software dealing with next generation media production pipeline. Participate in cutting-edge research and applications in machine learning and artificial intelligence. Work with latest AI algorithms and research, experiment possible use cases. Work with containers and Kubernetes on application/microservices deployments and managements Qualifications: BA/BS degree in Computer Science, related technical field, or equivalent practical experience. At least have 2+ year relative work/research experience. Extensive experience writing clean and efficient Python/Golang code, with good use of standard algorithms, data structures, and libraries. Ability to write clean, efficient code and maintain the overall health of the code base Preferred Qualifications: MA/MS/PHD degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, or related technical field. Experienced in C++, web programming. Computer system experiences. Practical experience in NLP, CV. Machine learning/Neural Network project experience. Solid distributed system, GPU programming, Video processing experiences. Experienced with container and Kubernetes Experienced with video/media production programming Bilingual in Mandarin preferred Culture Fit: Mission alignment: If you want to be part of a team to accomplish this great mission, we will provide you the best possible platform to do that. Self-directed: We work best with people that are driven, motivated, and aspire to greatness. Hungry to learn: We are eager to see you learn new skills and grow. Team orientation: We work in small, fast-moving teams. We watch out for each other and go after big goals together as a team. Benefits: 401(k) matching Cell phone, Internet & gym reimbursement Health, Dental & Vision insurance

Job Responsibilities: Responsible for the design and development of Baidu's virtual, digital, human 3D rendering engine Responsible for building the level and implementing the logical interaction within the level, animation and sequences Responsible for designing and developing functional plug-ins for UE4/5. Responsible for locating and fixing rendering engine related issues; performance optimization based on resource statistics (shader, drawcall) Job Requirements: Bachelor degree or above (computer or related major is preferred) More than 2 years of UE project development experience; skilled use of UE4/5 development engine for development, familiar with level blueprints, animation blueprints, GameMode, lighting, BlendShape, collision, physics, etc. Familiar with C/C++ programming language, can use C++ and blueprint for function development Excellent team spirit, rigorous work attitude, high quality awareness, strong communication skills Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, intellectual curiosity, and the courage to solve difficult problems Strong interest in Internet products and technologies, and keen to pursue technological excellence and innovation Familiar with model making, bone rigging, and animation is preferred Familiar with the principles of 3D graphics, with good mathematical and algorithmic foundation, is preferred In-depth understanding of graphics rendering, familiarity with OpenGL, Vulkan and other technologies is preferred Culture Fit: Mission alignment: If you want to be part of a team to accomplish this great mission, we will provide you the best possible platform to do that. Self-directed: We work best with people that are driven, motivated, and aspire to greatness. Hungry to learn: We are eager to see you learn new skills and grow. Team orientation: We work in small, fast-moving teams. We watch out for each other and go after big goals together as a team.
